meanings: Love is the elders' love for the young
An adorable child should be disciplined with a rod

vlive.english: I love you guys! Thank you!

examples.korean: I love the reds and golds of autumn. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 빨갛고 노란 가을 단풍을 사랑한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I love the reds and golds of autumn. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Being in love must have addled your brain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사랑에 빠져서 네 머리가 어떻게 되었던 모양이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Being in love must have addled your brain. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They were whispering endearments to each other. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 서로에게 사랑의 말을 속삭이고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were whispering endearments to each other. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He ached to be home with his loved ones. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 사랑하는 사람들이 있는 집에 가고 싶어 못 견딜 정도였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He ached to be home with his loved ones. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her experience of divorce shattered her illusions about love. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 이혼 경험은 사랑에 대한 환상을 산산조각 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her experience of divorce shattered her illusions about love. Add to Wordbook
